what: Fix older result returns the same result problem
Remove links from values, replace with hover context buttons.
Fix broken histogram on immediate search.
Ability to switch between UTC and local time in the settings.
Copy to clipboard values should not have escaped html entities.
Added a collapsed transformer to display field only if the previous value is different.
Styling and layout fixes for histogram and scrollbars.
Allow default terms per data source.
Display a changelog on the welcome screen.
Context links should remove other terms from query.
Always show context icon for "clear" context action.
Contexts must explicitly use /slashes/ to use regexp.
